column4: Hi there, ive been trying to share a connection between my ubuntu pc and my xbox 360. i read a tutorial on how to do it with firestarter, but i always get an error sasying eht0 interface is not ready. is there an easy way to do it with ubuntu 8.10? i currently have 8.04 and will upgrade soon. thanks
- are you using a cable or wireless?
> are you trying to FTP on?
> cant you connect a cable from your router to your 360 ?
